comments.raw_text:
User agent:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:6.0a2) Gecko/20110606 Firefox/6.0a2 (Aurora)

Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch Firefox/Aurora on a clean profile and open the about:Firefox window
2. Choose the "Change" option to switch to another channel (i.e. "beta" channel)
3. Click the "Apply and update" button
4. Close the window ("x" button) and reopen it from the menu

Expected result:
After step 4 the download/switching process is either expected to restart from the beginning or continue from where it stopped

Actual result:
After step 4, the download/switching process hangs.
